route Module¶

Seshat Web App/API framework built on top of gevent routing decorator

For more information, see: https://github.com/JoshAshby/

http://xkcd.com/353/

Josh Ashby 2014 http://joshashby.com joshuaashby@joshashby.com

class seshat.route.AutoURL(pageObject)[source]¶

Base container and for generating and storing the url, and controller class in the route table.

seshat.route.route()[source]¶

Class decorator that will take and generate a route table entry for the decorated controller class, based off of its name and its file hierarchy

Use like so:

from seshat.base_object import BaseObject
from seshat.route import route

@route()
class ControllerAndPageName(BaseObject):
    pass
